com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class LegoMindstormsNxtBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.LegoMindstormsNxtBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Deleteable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LegoMindstormsNxtSensor, NxtDirectCommands, NxtDrive

    public class LegoMindstormsNxtBase
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Component, Deleteable
    A base class for components that can control a LEGO MINDSTORMS NXT robot.
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)
